item.title: The Project - GSoC '23
item.description: I received the email saying that my proposal for GSoC ‘23 was accepted by X.Org Foundation on May 5th. It’s my first time working with open-source communities and I’m really excited about it. My mentor Martin Roukala gave me some great advice and helped me understand the project and my tasks better. Now it’s time to dive into the project details.
